Sentencas: In this work, the Mn-Co spinel coating is successfully employed to control adverse reactions at the Crofer 22 APU interconnect/Ag-CuO braze interface through blocking their direct contact.
Titulo: Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing

Sentencas: The Mn-Co spinel coating is fabricated on the Crofer 22 APU before reactive air brazing (RAB).
Titulo: Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing

Sentencas: Wetting of Ag-CuO braze on the Mn-Co spinel coated Crofer 22 APU is studied.
Titulo: Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing

Sentencas: Ag-8mol%CuO braze is used to successfully braze the Mn-Co spinel coated Crofer 22 APU and YSZ at 1050 degrees C for 30 min in air.
Titulo: Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing

Sentencas: The Crofer 22 APU is protected well by the Mn -Co spinel coating during RAB, avoiding its oxidation and the outward diffusion of Fe and Cr.
Titulo: Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing

Sentencas: The long-term stability of joints is also evaluated in air at 800 degrees C for 200 h.
Titulo: Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing

Sentencas: The Mn-Co spinel coating effectively mitigates further degradation of the joint caused by oxidation at the interconnect/braze interface.
Titulo: Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing
Exploring the role of Mn-Co spinel coating on Crofer 22 APU in adjusting reactions with the Ag based sealant during reactive air brazing
